```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

+ `class` is a property assigned to an object that determines how generic functions operate with it. It is not a mutually exclusive classification.  

+ `mode` is a mutually exclusive classification of objects according to their basic structure. The 'atomic' modes are `numeric`, `complex`, `character` and `logical`.
